0.title: Service Failure Count Sum by Service Name
0.query:
timeseries service_failure_count_sum = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), by:{ service.entity.name, dt.entity.service }, 
filter:dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd service.entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsRemove(dt.entity.service)
| sort service_failure_count_sum desc
| limit 25

1.title: Host CPU Average by Host Name
1.query:
timeseries host_cpu_avg = avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{ host.entity.name, dt.entity.host }, 
filter:dt.entity.host in [fetch dt.entity.host | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd host.entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsRemove(dt.entity.host)
| sort host_cpu_avg desc
| limit 25

2.title: Service Response Time Average by Service Name
2.query:
timeseries service_response_time_avg = avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by:{ service.entity.name, dt.entity.service }, 
filter:dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd service.entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsRemove(dt.entity.service)
| sort service_response_time_avg desc
| limit 25

3.title: Service Request Count Average by Service Name
3.query:
timeseries service_request_count_sum = sum(dt.service.request.count), by:{ service.entity.name, dt.entity.service }, 
filter:dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd service.entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsRemove(dt.entity.service)
| sort service_request_count_sum desc
| limit 25
